description:
Developed and maintained a SaaS platform (confidential) for a subsidiary company using MERN stack.
Built browser automation scripts with Playwright/Patchright to handle workflows.
Managed full-stack architecture: Next.js frontend, Node.js/Express microservices, BullMQ with Redis.
Integrated AI features into workflows and designed automation pipelines.
Led feature research and planning from scratch: identified requirements, prioritized scripts/features.
Configured and managed secure email service using Mailcow on VPS for internal operations.

Worked on feature upgrades, bug fixes, and enhancements for the Hospital/Clinic Management Tool using React.js, Node.js, and Express.js.
    Integrated WhatsApp webflows for messaging and forms; fixed token-based appointment system bugs.
    Developed MongoDB backup scripts and integrated Haptik Meta API wrapper.
    Contributed to AI Agentic Workflow research for architecture planning using N8N and Dify.
    Enhanced Excel export analysis reports using the XLSX library.
    Made content updates and form submission logic improvements on the main Next.js website.
